diff_hunk:

body:
Sure, I will add one soon. 

As a quick explanation, this is a part of original `TH_TENSOR_DIM_APPLY3`, extracted out meant to refactor the size check so that scatter can apply its own check. The `TH_TENSOR_DIM_APPLY3` is still there below.
